comments.body: You may want to introduce passing the ledger configuration in a separate PR, i.e., as we don't check configurations yet by the committer anyway (this would need removal of `SubmitterInfo.ledgerConfiguration` as well or always setting it to the default).
I could, but it would be an ignored parameter and we'd have to suppress some warnings. I was trying to avoid this.
No problem — after merging the PRs you've broken out from this one, passing the ledger configuration should be a minimal addition.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@      commands: Commands,
      submissionSeed: crypto.Hash,
      ledgerConfiguration: Configuration,
  )(implicit
      ec: ExecutionContext,
